mapper.select: SELECT k.keyword_name AS keywordName, COUNT(k.keyword_seq) AS totalCount FROM KEYWORDS k JOIN REVIEWS r ON k.review_seq = r.review_seq JOIN SHOES s ON r.shoe_seq = s.shoe_seq JOIN CATEGORIES c ON s.category_seq = c.category_seq WHERE s.parent_category_seq_name = #{parent_category_seq_name} GROUP BY k.keyword_name ORDER BY totalCount DESC LIMIT 6
